27D057A2.Line7.541E6: I will wait here for you to return... or until the sun rises again.

59F2EB1C.Line1.541E6: A great and terrible beast. It has plagued the Steppes all season, laying waste to crops, caravans, and warriors alike.

9354E2EE.Line9.BAE4.Bar: You will not be waiting long.

C8FC5149.VoiceDir1.541E6: Only slighly somber. Such threats are common in the Steppes.

C9C535FB.VoiceDir9.BAE4.Bar: Confident. Ready. Heading inside the cave.

F3E7649E.Line3.541E6: Bring me its head as an offering to our ancestors. Then, we may call you Oxen Tribe.
